articles.title: Twitter verification is coming back, Elon Musk now the second richest person
articles.description: In this week's top stories, Twitter is set to relaunch its public verification program and wants your feedback, Elon Musk has officially become the world's second richest person and Santa Claus is now available for Zoom calls up until Christmas Eve.
